review: I know a lot of people really love the Chromecast device, but I truly regret this purchase.  My long time stable home wireless network now is a constant worry.  My tablet and phone will not connect to the internet once Chromecast has been turned on without first unplugging Chromecast, then unplugging the modem, then powering off each of my devices, then plugging the modem back in, then powering up each device, forgetting my network on each, signing back on to my network on each device, and then *trying* (50% success rate) to connect to my network.  Nobody has any answers for this, though through googling I've found others with the problem.  To me, Chromecast is not worth all this trouble, and it is going back.  I just hope I can somehow get my wireless network back to its customary exemplary operation once Chromecast is out of here!!  What a pain.
author: Amazon Customer "Evie"

review: For those of you who don't know how this works:You plug it into the back of your TV in an HDMI slot  (one not already in use...) and it allows you to do things on that TV that you couldn't normally do.Basically, any App (Application) you can run on your phone, can be run on your TV via bluetooth.Like what?Like watch your Netflix movies or shows on a TV that doesn't have an internet connection!  That's really cool! No extra account needed!Show your photos from your phone on your TV screen (via bluetooth.) so everyone in the room can see themUse it as a remote for the TV via your smartphone.broadcast a movie from your phone on your TV.Again, basically, any App (Application) you can run on your phone, can be run on your TV via bluetooth.And- it doesn't have to be plugged in to a wall outlet the whole time!Drawbacks:When it is plugged in to the back of the TV, you can't just switch it off to watch regular TV or whatever. You have to unplug it.  Once it has been paired with your smart phone or ipad, it will automatically look for that connection as long as this device is plugged in to the back of the TV.Any games you can play on your smart phone can be played on your TV screen via bluetooth
